name: Puuuuuuush!
description:
Puuuuuuush!(thats 7 u's) is a game about saving the King from a rather stupid death. How you might ask? With raw strength of course. 

Get ready for a lot of fun (and cramps)

This game features: 

-A leaderboard

-Challenging and fun gameplay

Credits:

Voice acting by BonFireLit

"Art" by me

Coding by me

Music:

Malicious by Kevin MacLeod
